Text.Language: Anok de kata p~a~sai n~te peknai eie~i~ e~qoun e~pek/i: ouoh eie~ouwst nahren pekervei eyouab.
But as for me, in the abundance of Your mercy, I will enter into Your house; I will bow down in worship toward Your holy temple.
وأنا كمثلِ كثرةِ رحمتِكَ، أدخلُ إلى بيتِكَ وأسجدُ نحو هيكلِكَ المقدس.
Mpem~yo n~niaggeloc ]naer'alin e~rok: ouoh ]naouwst nahren pekervei eyouab.
I will praise You before the angels, and bow down in worship toward Your holy temple.
أمامَ الملائكةِ أرتلُ لكَ وأسجدُ نحو هيكلِكَ المقدس.
